first.question: You would like to apply for higher education, and the apply for polytechnics and universities has begun.
answers: You search online for information on areas of education that might interest you
You don't look for any information about the areas of education, but you are filling in the application form according to the areas that sound interesting
You are not going to fill out the application form because you just do not feel like it

alaLoydetty.question: You found areas of education that interest you.
answers: You follow the instructions to fill out the application form
Completing the application form is too difficult, so you are not going to apply
Completing the application form is too difficult, so you ask an acquaintance for help

uusiYritys.question: A year has passed and the apply for polytechnics and universities has begun again.
answers: You search online for information on areas of education that might interest you
You don't look for any information about the areas of education, but you are filling in the application form according to the areas that sound interesting
You are not going to fill out the application form this year either

kutsu.question: You will later receive a message in your mail/\e-mail containing information and an invitation to the entrance exam.
answers: You will read the instructions carefully and you are going to take the entrance exam at the agreed time
You don't have to read the instructions because they are so long, but you still plan to go to the entrance exam at the agreed time
You throw it in trash, no fun to go to study

paasykoe.question: It is an entrance exam day. What will you do?
answers: You go to the entrance exam well in advance and follow the instructions there
You go to the entrance exam last minute and follow the instructions there
You would like to have some pizza now, so you go to eat and apply again next year

loppu.question: You will find out later that you passed the entrance exam. You were also sent information about your new place of study.
answers: You will carefully read the information about your new place of study, receive the place of study and start school on the day stated in the instructions
It's not fun to study, so you don't accept a place to study
